content: You can find the Xiang River Goddess Gourd in the chest-filled chamber you pass through on your way to fight the Elder Armourworm in the Webbed Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Turtle_Treasure_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Turtle Treasure Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Turtle Treasure Fight'.
The content is as follows:
You can find the Xiang River Goddess Gourd in the chest-filled chamber you pass through on your way to fight the Elder Armourworm in the Webbed Hollow.
